Multipurpose Blender: Design a blender that can perform multiple functions beyond just blending. For example, it could have attachments for making pasta, ice cream, or even nut butter.
Eco-Friendly Blender: Create a blender made from sustainable materials, such as recycled plastic or bamboo, to reduce its environmental impact.
Portable Blender: Develop a compact, lightweight blender that can be easily taken on-the-go. This could include a rechargeable battery pack and a portable charging base.
Voice-Controlled Blender: Incorporate voice recognition technology into the blender, allowing users to control its functions without touching any buttons.
Self-Cleaning Blender: Design a blender with self-cleaning capabilities, such as a built-in cleaning mode or a detachable cleaning brush.
